page.title: 17LOCAL POLICE
page.content:
P.C. Jeffard is the Community Constable for the Frenchay and Hambrook area. Many questions were asked about this area. Although there is not a lot of crime here they do get some occasionally, mostly burglaries and vandalism.
Community Constable for ChristChurch is P.C. Copp. We asked him _ {1.What sort of job do you do? "I visit people after a crime has been commited and I do my best to ensure crimes are prevented.I sometimes visit schools and talk to the children." {2.What sort of trouble do you have {to deal with most? "There are quite a few incidents vandalism and damage to property. Someone takes a disliking to people who park their cars on the common, he/she punctures their tyres!"
